message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you the chance to purchase this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $12,000.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I believe I can't justify the price of $12,000. Would you consider lowering it to $10,000?
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your understanding of the value.  While $12,000 is my ideal price, I could be persuaded to let it go for $11,000.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I'll try to stay within my budget. Could you possibly lower the price to $9,500?
